title: Welcome to Quentin's website
description: Happy to open the 'News' section of my brand new website.
contents:
Welcome; I’m happy to open my brand-new website’s “News” section.


Here you’ll find news about recently published articles, new positions,
and more generally scientific and lab. actualities.




This section is currently in progress, but some content will be added
soon.




          



While introducing my website, I should give credit where credit is
due by citing several resources I used myself to build and customize my
own website using Distill
for R Markdown.
After a first look to the
Distill for R Markdown
tutorial webpage, one of the most useful resources I used is the
The Distillery website, which
contains a nice
showcase that
can be explored to find some inspiration, but also a great
Tips &
tricks section where you can find many ways to customize or add new
features to your own blog or website.
Also, the blog of Ella Kaye,
Danielle Navarro,
John Paul Helveston and
Tom Mock contain much advice to
improve the appearance and add several functionalities to your Distill
blog or website.
Finally, it is possible to customize website’s style by using icons
and animals silhouette using internet libraries such as
Font Awesome,
Academicons and
phylopic or by embedding
altmetric and
dimension badges to
your publication record.

Last updated on

[1] "2023-01-15 13:15:53 CET"
